about_the_game:
JACKPOISON fully permits both corporate and individual users to make videos and live-stream games.

This game is a combination of slot and battle RPG!
You eat mushrooms and control slots,
You can accumulate coins to unlock skills!
Rescue the fairies from the bosses who abuse the power of mushrooms!

Four main elements of the game.

Slots.
　From the slot, there are roles that simply increase the coins or allow you to progress in combat, such as attacking.
　Matching 7s will give you a large amount of coins and progress the game significantly.

The skill tree.
　Spend the coins increased by slots to open up skills.
　There are nearly 50 different skills that can be used to advance the game, such as combat and slots.
　Opening up skills will power up the entire game and propel the game forward.

The mushroom.
　The game's slots are not just about luck.
　By eating mushrooms[/b], you can manipulate the role you win to some extent.

The battle.
　The battle proceeds according to the result of the slot.
　The result depends on the hero's status and your luck.
　You may get mushrooms when you defeat enemies.

Master these four elements and rescue the forest fairies!

JACKPOISON fully permits both corporate and individual users to make videos and live-stream games.

The battle.

　The result depends on the hero's status and your luck.

name: JACKPOISON

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10(64bit)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
